lead_paragraph: Firefighters found the body of Romulo Heras, 61, inside an apartment in East New York shortly after 9 a.m. on Friday.
snippet: Firefighters found the body of Romulo Heras, 61, inside an apartment in East New York shortly after 9 a.m. on Friday.

headline.main: Death of Man in Brooklyn Fire Is Called a Homicide
headline.print_headline: Death of Man in Fire Is Called a Homicide

abstract: Brooklyn police rule death of Romulo Heras homicide; body was found inside burning apartment building in East New York.
